schema.name: RkkResourcePasses

calc-values.script: id == null ? false : T(ru.intertrust.cmj.rest.tuning.expressions.TuningFunctions).getEntityByUNID(id) == null ? false : T(ru.intertrust.cmj.rest.tuning.expressions.TuningFunctions).getEntityByUNID(id).signing() == null ? false : T(ru.intertrust.cmj.rest.tuning.expressions.TuningFunctions).getEntityByUNID(id).signing().getSigner() == null ? false : T(ru.intertrust.cmj.rest.tuning.expressions.TuningFunctions).getEntityByUNID(id).signing().getSigner().equals(T(ru.intertrust.cmj.af.core.AFSession).get().currentUser().getBeard()) ? true : false
